scripts.backend: npm run backend-build && npm run backend-deploy
scripts.backend-build: cd src/backend/transcriber/ && mvn package && npm run backend-package
scripts.backend-package: cd src/backend/transcriber/ && zip backend.zip Dockerfile target/transcriber-1.0-SNAPSHOT-jar-with-dependencies.jar src/main/resources/log4j2.xml
scripts.backend-deploy: aws s3 cp src/backend/transcriber/backend.zip s3://media-analysis-demo/build/ --acl public-read
scripts.build: npm run webui-build && npm run lambda-build && npm run cfn-build && npm run backend-build
scripts.cfn-copy-lambda-dist-ensure-folders: if [ ! -d './backend/functions/layers/aws_sdk' ]; then mkdir -p backend/functions/layers/aws_sdk; fi && if [ ! -d './backend/functions/layers/fp' ]; then mkdir -p backend/functions/layers/fp; fi &&  if [ ! -d './backend/functions/orchestrator/dist/' ]; then mkdir -p backend/functions/orchestrator/dist/; fi && if [ ! -d './backend/functions/setup/dist/' ]; then mkdir -p backend/functions/setup/dist/; fi
scripts.cfn-copy-lambda-dist: cp -R src/backend/functions/layers/aws_sdk ./backend/functions/layers && cp -R src/backend/functions/layers/fp ./backend/functions/layers && cp -R src/backend/functions/orchestrator/dist/ ./backend/functions/orchestrator/dist/ && cp -R src/backend/functions/setup/dist ./backend/functions/setup/dist
scripts.cfn-deploy: npm run zip && aws s3 cp ./v$npm_package_version.zip s3://$CFN_BUCKET/$npm_package_name/v$npm_package_version/$npm_package_name.zip
scripts.cfn-package: npm run cfn-ensure-dist && cfn-flip -c -n -l src/cfn/template.yaml templates/template.yaml && npm run cfn-copy-lambda-dist-ensure-folders && npm run cfn-copy-lambda-dist
scripts.cfn-test-local: npm run lambda-build && npm run cfn-build && npm run cfn-build && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file templates/template.yaml --stack-name MediaAnalysis --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.deploy: npm run webui-deploy && npm run backend-deploy && npm run cfn-deploy
scripts.lambda-build: npm run lambda-build-layers && npm run lambda-build-orchestrator && npm run lambda-build-setup
scripts.postinstall: cd src/frontend && npm i && cd ../backend/functions/setup && npm i && cd ../orchestrator && npm i
scripts.test: npm run cfn-test && npm run webui-test && npm run orch-test
scripts.webui-deploy: cd src/frontend/build && aws s3 cp . s3://media-analysis-demo/static --recursive --acl public-read --exclude settings.js --exclude .DS_Store
